mapper.select:
SELECT td.orderId,td.orderState,td.buildTime,td.orderTotalPrice, (SELECT goodsPicture FROM t_goods WHERE goodsId = tod.goodsId) AS goodsPicture, (SELECT goodsAdvertising FROM t_goods WHERE goodsId = tod.goodsId) AS goodsAdvertising, tod.goodsName,tod.goodsId,tod.sale,tod.purchaseNum,tod.isEvaluate FROM t_order td LEFT JOIN t_order_details tod ON td.orderId = tod.orderId WHERE
td.orderState = 1 and
td.orderState in (2,3) and
customerId = #{currentUserId} AND tod.isdetele = 1 AND td.isdetele = 1

SELECT ts.storeName,ts.storeAddress, (SELECT regionName FROM t_region WHERE regionId = ts.province) AS province, (SELECT regionName FROM t_region WHERE regionId = ts.city) AS city, (SELECT regionName FROM t_region WHERE regionId = ts.location) AS location FROM t_store ts WHERE invitationCode = #{invitationCode}
mapper.insert: insert into t_goods_evaluate ( evaluateId, customerId, goodsId, starLevel, appraiseInfo, imagesUrl, isdetele, buildTime, modifiyTime, createBy, lastModifiyBy, VERSION ) values ( #{evaluateId}, #{customerId}, #{goodsId}, #{starLevel}, #{appraiseInfo}, #{imagesUrl}, 1, now(), now(), #{customerId}, #{customerId}, 0 )
mapper.update: update t_order_details set isEvaluate = 1 where goodsId = #{goodsId} and userId = #{currentUserId} and isdetele = 1
mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT userName FROM t_user WHERE userId = customerId) AS customerName, starLevel,appraiseInfo,imagesUrl,buildTime FROM t_goods_evaluate WHERE
starLevel = 5 and
starLevel between 3 and 4 and
starLevel between 0 and 2 and
goodsId = #{goodsId} AND isdetele = 1
SELECT count(storeId) FROM t_store WHERE invitationCode = #{invitationCode} AND isdetele = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE t_customer SET invitationCode = #{invitationCode} WHERE userId = #{customerId} AND isdetele = 1
